biotools.summary: Chewie Nomenclature Server (chewie-NS) is a web server that allows users to share genome-based gene-by-gene typing schemas and to maintain a common nomenclature, simplifying the comparison of results. The combination between local analyses and a public repository of allelic data strikes a balance between potential confidentiality issues and the need to compare results.

bioschemas.name: chewie-NS
